text: Victor Aleksandrovich Krasin (also spelled Viktor Krasin, , 4 August 1929 – 3 September 2017) was a Russian human rights activist, economist, a former Soviet dissident and a political prisoner.Красин Виктор Александрович (р.1929) экономист, правозащитник in Russian At the time of his death Krasin was a US citizen. He was the founder of Initiative Group for the Defense of Human Rights in the USSR. He was born in Kyiv, Ukraine. Krasin died in Nahariya, Israel on 3 September 2017 at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Russian writers Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Russian economists Category:Russian human rights activists Category:Writers from Kyiv Category:Soviet dissidents
